name: expressjs-webserver
description:
Expressjs Application 1. At command prompt, create a folder expressjs-webserver
$ mkdir expressjs-webserver 2. Change folder to the newly created folder
$ cd expressjs-webserver 3. Initialize nodejs (this command will create package.json)
$ npm init -y 4. Open folder using vscode
$ code . 5. create index.js 5. open package.json to explore dependencies (libraries), then install them
$ npm install 6. copy content from index.js on github to your index.js 7. Run nodejs application from the command prompt
$ node index.js 8. Open browser http://localhost:3000 and http://localhost:3000/admin 9. Try http://localhost:3000/account (you should see 404 error in chrome dev tool) 10. Use ctrl+c to stop node application
